outline:
1. heat, rage, hot displeasure, indignation, anger, wrath, poison, bottles
    1. heat
      1. fever
      2. venom, poison (fig.)
    2. burning anger, rage
kjv_def: anger, bottles, hot displeasure, furious(-ly, -ry), heat, indignation, poison, rage, wrath(-ful). See H2529 (חֶמְאָה).
strongs_def: heat; figuratively, anger, poison (from its fever)
